channel.title: I need some help with bolts
channel.description: Now, i want to add bolts to a 317 server. But now i have 3 problems. 1. Where can i change the smithing interface to add unfinished bolts in it? 2. I heard there are no unfinished bolts in a 317 server. But can i add them (too on the smithing interface) by custom item? If yes, does anyone know the ID of the model? 3. Can i add topaz bolts and topaz etc. through custom items too? If yes, how? But the most important is question 1 and 2.

item.title: I need some help with bolts
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Now, i want to add bolts to a 317 server.
But now i have 3 problems.

  1. Where can i change the smithing interface to add unfinished bolts in it?
  2. I heard there are no unfinished bolts in a 317 server. But can i add them (too on the smithing interface) by custom item? If yes, does anyone know the ID of the model?
  3. Can i add topaz bolts and topaz etc. through custom items too? If yes, how? But the most important is question 1 and 2.

Read full topic
